perturbation.original_text: General Rights. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Company hereby grants to MA the right to advertise, market and sell to corporate users, government agencies and educational facilities (“Clients”) for their own internal language learning, soft skills and communication purposes only, and not for remarketing or redistribution, and not for use in a data center environment for multiple users Clients, unless otherwise agreed to by Company prior in writing, the Technology listed in Schedule A of this Agreement, and to sell and/or bundle Technology Maintenance for the Technology and to provide first line technical support and implementation services for the Technology in the territories listed in Schedule A of this Agreement, providing MA meets the criteria required for delivering services according to Schedule A.
perturbation.changed_text: General Rights. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Company hereby grants to MA the right to advertise, market and sell to corporate users, government agencies and educational facilities (“Clients”) for any purpose, including remarketing and redistribution, for use in a data center environment for multiple users Clients, without requiring further approval by Company, the Technology listed in Schedule A of this Agreement, and to sell and/or bundle Technology Maintenance for the Technology and to provide first line technical support and implementation services for the Technology in the territories listed in Schedule A of this Agreement, providing MA meets the criteria required for delivering services according to Schedule A.
perturbation.explanation: The original text restricts the definition of the purpose that the 'Clients' could use for the services. This restricts the use to 'their own internal language learning, soft skills and communication purposes only, and not for remarketing or redistribution'. The changed text removes such a condition, therefore conflicting with the original contract and allowing potential legal disputes.

perturbation.original_text: MA shall protect copyrights, tradenames, trademarks, service marks, trade secrets and other confidential proprietary rights and information of Company and its affiliates and report promptly any infringements or suspected infringements of which MA becomes aware and to cooperate fully with Company in its efforts to protect its copyrights, tradenames, trademarks, service marks, trade secrets and other confidential proprietary rights and information.
perturbation.changed_text: MA shall protect copyrights, tradenames, trademarks, service marks, trade secrets and other confidential proprietary rights and information of Company and its affiliates, except for those it independently develops, and report promptly any infringements or suspected infringements of which MA becomes aware and to cooperate fully with Company in its efforts to protect its copyrights, tradenames, trademarks, service marks, trade secrets and other confidential proprietary rights and information.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires MA to protect all intellectual property of the Company. The changed text introduces an exception that MA doesn't need to protect the company if it's something they independently develop, which introduces conflict with section 12.1 where it states that the technology is the exclusive property of the company. This allows MA to leverage the company's proprietary information.

perturbation.original_text: Company reserves the right to change its process and/or fees, from time to time, in its sole and absolute discretion. In the event of a price and/or fee change for Technology, Company shall notify MA in writing ninety (90) days prior to the effective date of any such change. All other prices and/or fees may be adjusted without prior notice to MA.
perturbation.changed_text: Company reserves the right to change its process and/or fees, from time to time, in its sole and absolute discretion. In the event of a price and/or fee change for Technology, Company shall notify MA in writing thirty (30) days prior to the effective date of any such change. All other prices and/or fees may be adjusted with a 60-day notice to MA.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies a 90-day notice for Technology price changes and no notice for other fees. The changed text specifies 30-day notice for Technology and a 60-day notice to MA for any other fees. This creates a contradiction regarding notification periods, potentially leading to disputes.
